snippet: George Zimmerman was confused and fearful when he and his wife misrepresented their finances at a bond hearing that allowed his release, his lawyer said Monday.
abstract: Lawyer for George Zimmerman says that his client, whose bail was revoked after prosecutors claimed he had deceived the court, was confused and fearful when he and his wife misrepresented their finances at the bond hearing that allowed his release.
lead_paragraph: George Zimmerman was confused and fearful when he and his wife misrepresented their finances at a bond hearing that allowed his release, his lawyer said Monday.
